content: I cannot predict the future with certainty. however, it is possible that the shift towards streaming services and online releases could have an impact on the kinds of stories that are told in films. with online platforms providing a wider array of options for viewers, it may encourage filmmakers to take more risks and tell more diverse and innovative stories. additionally, as streaming platforms focus on building their own libraries of original content, we may see more funding and support for independent filmmakers and smaller productions that explore different perspectives and topics. all of these factors could lead to a broader range of stories being told in films, both in terms of content and approach, catering to varying tastes and demographics.
